questoes.frase_oculta: I like to play football on Sundays
alternativas: I like to play football on Sundays
I like to play basketball on Sundays
I like to swim on Sundays
questoes.resposta_correta: I like to play football on Sundays
questoes.explicacao: A frase correta é sobre jogar futebol, como indicado no áudio.

questoes.frase_oculta: She is reading a book in the library
alternativas: She is reading a book in the library
She is reading a magazine in the library
She is writing a book in the library
questoes.resposta_correta: She is reading a book in the library
questoes.explicacao: O áudio indica que ela está lendo um livro na biblioteca.

questoes.frase_oculta: They went to the park to play football
alternativas: They went to the park to play football
They went to the park to swim
They went to the park to study
questoes.resposta_correta: They went to the park to play football
questoes.explicacao: O áudio mostra que eles foram ao parque jogar futebol.
